title: Google rolling out ‘Fast Emergency Dialer’ to Pixel lockscreen w/ local numbers
content:
Google is starting to roll out a new feature to its Pixel lineup, with a “Fast Emergency Dialer” that puts local contact information for police, fire, and medical services at your fingertips.

more…

The post Google rolling out ‘Fast Emergency Dialer’ to Pixel lockscreen w/ local numbers appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is rolling out a new "Fast Emergency Dialer" to Pixel phones that changes the number based on your current location in the world.
